snippet: Over the last 12 to 18 months, one buzzword at Microsoft has come to encapsulate a bold redesign of the look of its most high-profile products: Metro. Now Microsoft is banishing the name from its products.
abstract: Over the last 12 to 18 months, one buzzword at Microsoft has come to encapsulate a bold redesign of the look of its most high-profile products: Metro. Now Microsoft is banishing the name from its products.

headline.main: Microsoft Drops Metro Name for New Product Look
